field.name: description
field.value:
The .castle extension is hard coded into the RoutingModuleEx.CreateMrPath
If you setup a rule such that new PatterRule("/index.rails").DefaultForArea().Is("Area").DefaultForController().Is("Home").DefaultForAction().Is("Index")
in order to rewrite /index.rails into /area/home/index.rails
you will have the url rewritten to /area/home/index.castle
Where this becomes a problem is that any other urls that come from UrlBuilder will now use the .castle extension.
Nothing blows up, but some may be confused. I also had a long enough time explaining why there was a .rails extension to people, and now would have to explain a .castle extension.
